text: Mahendra Bahadur Shahi () is a Nepalese politician and former Chief Minister of Karnali, a province in western Nepal. He was member of the 1st Nepalese Constituent Assembly and Minister of Energy, Nepal.He was selected as Parliamentary Party leader of CPN (MC) for Karnali on 14 February 2018. He was appointed as the chief minister, according to Article 168 (1) of the Constitution of Nepal. He took the oath of his office and secrecy as a chief minister on 17 February 2018. == References == Category:Living people Category:Nepalese politicians
title: Mahendra Bahadur Shahi
